articles.title: Message of Sympathy to President of Sierra Leone
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to President of Sierra Leone
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Friday sent a message of sympathy to Ernest Bai Koroma, president of the Republic of Sierra Leone, over the flooding and mudslide caused by heavy rains that claimed big casualties and huge material losses in the capital of the country.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep condolences and sympathy to the government and people of the country and residents in flood-hit areas.
					
					 He wished them success in their efforts to recover from the damage as early as possible and achieve the national unity and socio-economic development under the leadership of the president.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Hits U.S. Vice-President's Reckless Action
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Hits U.S. Vice-President's Reckless Action
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Saturday over the fact that the vice-president of the U.S. requested several countries in Latin America to sever diplomatic relations with the DPRK:
					 Recently, the vice-president of the U.S., during his junket to Chile, requested Brazil, Mexico, Chile and Peru to sever diplomatic relations with the DPRK.
					
					 This was not the first time for the U.S. to urge the countries which have friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK to sever the diplomatic and economic relations with it.
					
					 The U.S. is exerting pressure on many countries in Asia, Africa, Latin America and Europe to break off all relations with the DPRK.
					
					 This high-handed measure only reveals the rabid selfishness and arrogance of the U.S. that intends to sacrifice the entire globe for its own interests, and shows that its hostile policy toward the DPRK has reached extremes.
					
					 The U.S. pressure to sever the relations constitutes outrageous interference in the internal affairs of independent sovereign states and an open challenge to international law and order that invite condemnation and rejection.
					
					 If the U.S. malicious campaign of sanctions and pressure against the DPRK is ignored and permitted, all other countries are bound to fall victim to its interference in their internal affairs.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to further strengthen and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with countries around the world on the principles of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 No matter who may say what, the DPRK remains committed to its righteous and responsible efforts to frustrate the unjust and illegal sanctions and pressure campaign, defend the country's dignity and strategic status and realize genuine international justice.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Flails UN Secretary General for Misleading Public Opinion
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Flails UN Secretary General for Misleading Public Opinion
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Saturday as regards the fact that the secretary general of the United Nations claimed as if the cause of escalated tension on the Korean peninsula lies with the DPRK:
					 Recently, the UN secretary general, at a press conference on the issue of the Korean Peninsula, made an absurd remark that the aggravation of tension on the peninsula was caused by the "nuclear and missile development" of the DPRK. 
					
					 His remark is no more than a revelation of his ignorance on the essence of the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 To make it clear, the root cause of the nuclear issue and the vicious cycle of aggravation of situation on the Korean peninsula is the U.S. hostile policy and its nuclear threats against the DPRK.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the UN secretary general to talk about taking a fair stand in resolving the issue of the Korean peninsula while he cannot say a word to the U.S. which is actually driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the extreme pitch.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S that caused all the trouble by deploying nuclear strategic assets on the Korean peninsula and, hence, in order to defuse the tension and prevent reckless military clash in and around the peninsula, the U.S. should first make the right decision and substantiate it through action.
					
					 The DPRK will, under no circumstances, flinch an inch from the road of bolstering up the nuclear force, the road chosen by itself, unless the nuclear threat of the U.S. and its hostile policy toward the DPRK are thoroughly eradicated.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Blames Australia for Joining U.S. in Aggravating Situation
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Blames Australia for Joining U.S. in Aggravating Situation
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on August 19 as regards the fact that the Australian government is joining the U.S. in aggravating the situation on the Korean peninsula and the region:
					 At a local radio interview on August 11, the Australian prime minister made reckless remarks that the allies including Australia were together with the U.S. and that ANZUS stood for the mutual defense between the U.S and Australia, should either one of them come under attack, and Australia would back the U.S. in time of emergency.
					
					 Meanwhile, the defense minister and the military brass hat of Australia officially announced that the Australian troops would participate in "Ulji Freedom Guardian" joint military exercises.
					
					 Trump faced a hail of criticism from numerous political and social figures of the U.S. including the Congress for revealing his war hysteria by making belligerent remarks such as "fire and fury", and the countries which are supposedly the U.S allies are trying to avoid getting involved in the aggressive maneuvers of the U.S.
					
					 Not long after the Australian prime minister had stated that they would join in the aggressive moves of the U.S., even referring to ANZUS which exists in name only, the Australian military announced that they would dispatch their troops to the aggressive nuclear exercises of the U.S. This is a suicidal act of inviting disaster as it is an illustration of political immaturity unaware of the seriousness of the current situation.
					
					 Great irony is that the Australian premier, who had once condemned the military option for confrontation of Trump that it will have destructive consequences, made U turn in his stand at the admonition of the U.S, taking no account of Australia's own interests.
					
					 Australia followed the U.S. to the Korean War, the Vietnamese War and the "war on terrorism", but heavy loss of lives and assets were all that it got in return.
					
					 The Australian government had better devote time and energy to maintaining peace of its own country, instead of forgetting the lessons learned in the past and joining the U.S. in the moves for nuclear war.
					
					 Countries like Australia that join the military adventure against the DPRK, blindly following the U.S., will never avoid the counter-measures of justice by the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreigners Return Home
articles.content:
Foreigners Return Home
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries left here for home on Saturday after attending the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					 They included the ambassador of the United Cities and Local Governments-Asia Pacific and his party, the chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and his party, the national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria and his party, the chairman of the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea and his party and the chairman of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, who are co-chairmen of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					
					 There were also a delegation of the Sri Lanka Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, a delegation of the Swedish Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, a delegation of the Danish Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, a delegation of the Slovenian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, a delegation of the Finland Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, a delegation of the British Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, a delegation of activists for Japan-Korea friendship, the co-chairman of the Oceanic Regional Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and his party, the chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and his party, the national secretary of the Radical Party of Left of France and his party, the secretary general of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America, the executive director of the Environmental Education Media Project, the chairman of the Slovenia Youth Party-Europe Greens, the chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, the representative of the Austrian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, the chairman of the Kuwaiti Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association.

articles.title: King's Mausoleum Discovered in DPRK
articles.content:
King's Mausoleum Discovered in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The mausoleum of Suk Jong, king of Koryo in the 15th generation, was recently discovered in Sonjok-ri, Kaesong City.
					 A research group of the Korean National Heritage Preservation Agency, together with researchers of the Global Environmental Information Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, analyzed the space distribution features about the places, in which mausoleums of kings of Koryo might exist, and succeeded in founding out the exact location of Suk Jong's mausoleum.
					
					 In union with researchers of the National Heritage Preservation Office in Kaesong City and Koryo Museum, they conducted excavation in Sonjok-ri for over 20 days from last May to June to find out his mausoleum.
					
					 Suk Jong was the third child of Mun Jong, king of Koryo in the 11th generation, and his original name was Wang Ong, who reigned for a decade from 1096 to 1105. The name of Suk Jong is his posthumous one.
					
					 The size of his mausoleum, located in the middle of somewhat low slope of a mountain, 3km west of the seat of Sonjok-ri, is north-south 29m long by west-east 13m wide.
					
					 The mausoleum has three sections, which are divided by four west-east embankments.
					
					 The Archaeology Society of the DPRK ascertained that the heritage was the mausoleum of Suk Jong.
					
					 It is of great significance in making clear the developed culture of Koryo, the first unified state of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Tele-Questioning and Answering System for Farming Techniques in DPRK
articles.content:
Tele-Questioning and Answering System for Farming Techniques in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A tele-questioning and answering system for farming techniques is being introduced at farms of the DPRK.
					 The Ministry of Agriculture regularly informs provincial, city and county agricultural guidance organs and farms of crop growth forecast through video meetings and organizes lectures of technology.
					
					 In particular, the tele-lecture and questioning and answering services are winning popularity.
					
					 At the tele-lecture competent scientists, university teachers and technicians in the field of agriculture across the country give answers to technical problems arising in farming of relevant units.
					
					 And a technical data service is conducted every day through homepage.
					
					 Meanwhile, an urgent lecture for new farming techniques is organized through mobile network.
					
					 Thanks to the tele-questioning and answering system for farming techniques, agricultural workers improve their technical and practical skills.

articles.title: Loach Breeding Brisk in Nampho Port
articles.content:
Loach Breeding Brisk in Nampho Port
Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Loach breeding is brisk in the DPRK. Nampho Port has put loach breeding on a sci-tech basis.
					 It built a breeding farm of hundreds of square meters and laid material and technical foundations.
					
					 It set up awnings on the roof of the farm and put Pistia stratiotes cv. into ponds to improve the quality of water and, at the same time, provided environment favorable for breeding. 
					
					 It also makes a rational use of compound food to raise weight increment.

articles.title: All Koreans Should Turn out in Anti-U.S. Struggle: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
All Koreans Should Turn out in Anti-U.S. Struggle: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should turn out in the anti-U.S. struggle for peace to turn the joy of greeting the anniversary of national liberation into the nation-wide joy of greeting the final victory by their united efforts, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 If he or she is a Korean, he or she should have national pride and confidence that the DPRK is possessed of tremendous muscle capable of blowing up the sinful American empire at a blow, and fully support and defend it, whether he or she lives in the north or in the south or abroad.
					
					 But the south Korean regime, far from hailing the world-startling event of the compatriots in the north, has gone so foolish as to play the role of a shock brigade of the U.S. in its "sanctions and pressure" upon the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. policy, terming the DPRK's self-defensive nuclear deterrent a "threat."
					
					 The regime hell-bent on sycophancy toward big powers introduced THAAD at last despite the public opposition at home and abroad, only to turn south Korea into a theater of confrontation among nuclear powers. Not content with this, it is inviting nuclear strategic assets from the U.S.
					
					 The situation goes to prove that "peace" much touted by the puppet regime is just hoax to mislead the public opinion and it pursues an ill-minded ambition to do harm to the compatriots in the north with the backing of outsiders only.
					
					 The south Korean regime should come to its senses, though belatedly, and refrain from the reckless "cooperation with outsiders in pressurizing the north." It should, instead, turn out in improving its ties with the north from the stand of national independence and paving a broad avenue toward independent reunification.
					
					 Consistent is the stand and will of the DPRK to achieve peace and stability on the Korean peninsula, improve the north-south relations and pave a path for national reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.

articles.title: DPRK's ICBM Test-Launch Is Just Option for Self-Defense: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's ICBM Test-Launch Is Just Option for Self-Defense: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Trump group of the U.S. mouthed rhetoric that the successive ICBM test-launch by the DPRK poses a "threat to the world" and they are ready to rapidly counter it. And they kicked off saber-rattling under the very eyes of the DPRK after introducing nuclear strategic assets, terming it a military counteraction to prevent "threat and provocation".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this brigandish theory of confusing right and wrong and sheer sophism that deserves not a passing note.
					
					 The U.S. seeks the sinister purpose of justifying its anti-DPRK action by deliberately falsifying the truth and labeling the DPRK "imposer of nuclear threat", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's test-launch of ICBM is a legitimate option for self-defense to tackle the nuclear threat from the U.S.
					
					 No one is entitled to fault the DPRK's steps to bolster up the nuclear force as it is an exercise of legitimate rights of an independent state.
					
					 The steps are not for posing a threat to the world but aimed to check the U.S. reckless moves for a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand that for the Korean army and people, the powerful war deterrent to defend the state is the precious strategic asset, which is irreversible and irreplaceable.
					
					 It is their fixed will and steadfast stand not to flinch even an inch from the road of bolstering up the nuclear force unless the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat are fundamentally removed.
					
					 The U.S. should bear this in mind and stop wagging its tongue recklessly.

articles.title: U.S. Sanctions and Pressure Will Bring Its Own Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Sanctions and Pressure Will Bring Its Own Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The UN Security Council "Sanctions resolution" 2371 cooked up by the U.S. is a blatant challenge to the DPRK as it is part of the hideous moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces, scared by the daily growing military muscle of Juche Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary. 
					 The commentary goes on
					
					 Absolutely intolerable are the ferocious moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces who cooked up the "resolution".
					
					 The U.S. will be made to pay a dear price for its moves to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last without dropping its inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward the ideology and social system chosen by the people of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in extremely military adventure and sanctions and pressure, seized with anachronistic wild ambition, while failing to face up to the trend of the times, it will only meet shameful destruction and final ruin.
					
					 Now that the U.S. brigandish acts have reached the extremes, the DPRK will dramatically bolster the strength of justice to remove the root cause of all injustice and evils, and it will show what fate awaits those standing in the way of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Juche Korea never makes an empty talk.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Discern Principal Enemy of Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Discern Principal Enemy of Nation
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Recently Trump uttered that even though a war breaks out, it would be fought on the Korean peninsula and even though thousands die, that will be on the peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article says this reveals the U.S. sordid intention not to rule out the provocation of a nuclear war in order to realize its ambition for invasion of the DPRK, regardless of whether the south Koreans suffer or not.
					
					 The situation urgently requires the south Koreans to see through the true nature of the U.S., principal enemy of the nation, and wage strenuous actions to drive the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea under the uplifted banner of independence against the U.S., the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 For the past 7 decades of the U.S. military presence in south Korea, the south Koreans have suffered unbearable national contempt and insult and have been forced to live a bitter life under the jackboots of the aggressors.
					
					 The U.S. is talking about "blood-sealed alliance" and importance of "alliance" whenever an opportunity presents itself, but it is just sugar-coated words to use the puppet forces as cheap cannon fodder for realizing its purpose of aggression.
					
					 At present, the south Korean authorities are getting hell-bent on the moves to stifle the DPRK in hands with the U.S., being seized by sycophancy toward the U.S. and dependence on outsiders. This is an intolerable act of treachery little short of leaving the destiny of the south Koreans to the tender mercy of aggressors.
					
					 They should clearly discern the principal enemy of the nation and part with the aggression-minded outsiders and make a bold decision to open the path to peace and reunification by pooling efforts with the fellow countrymen from the stand of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Provocative Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Provocative Remarks
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Traitor Song Yong Mu, defence minister of south Korea, at a video meeting of operational commanding officers of the puppet army shortly ago, called for "maintenance of high alert posture against the north" while citing "strategic provocation from the north" and "tactical provocation". After that, he toured areas around five islands in the West Sea including Yonphyong Island where he urged the need to "fight with confidence" in a "do-or-die" spirit.
					 Traitor Ri Sun Jin, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the puppet army, too, incited a war atmosphere while letting out such rhetoric as "preparations for preemptive attack".
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Saturday derides the puppet military warmongers who are spouting provocative remarks, unaware of their pitiful plight of surviving with the help of the U.S.
					
					 The disgusting behavior of the puppet warmongers going reckless with the backing of the U.S. without knowledge of how the world goes around clearly indicates their miserable end, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 They are not even reckoned with by the DPRK, but being unaware of their plight, the stooges of the U.S. have gone mischievous while adding fuel to the fire. This is a suicidal act of making the whole south Korean land, to say nothing of Seoul, suffer a disaster like Yonphyong Island which had been pounded by fire.
					
					 The puppet military warmongers should refrain from making bellicose remarks for which they can not be responsible, and stop acting rashly, mindful that the exercise of discretion is the best way for keeping their poor life.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Reducing Cyber Space into Battlefield
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Reducing Cyber Space into Battlefield
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The defense ministry of Japan is planning to boost the size and capability of its cyber unit. According to the plan, members of the cyber unit will be drastically increased and a department for specializing in the cyber attack capability be newly organized.
					 The Japanese reactionaries claim that such step will help increase the "defense" capability of the "Self-Defense Forces".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says that if the Japanese reactionaries take the above-said step only for "defense", they will be satisfied with the present capability and there is no need for them to organize a new department for specializing in the capability of cyber attack in the unit.
					
					 Their cyber unit is not for merely protecting the computer system of the SDF from hacking but for attacking computer system of its rivals, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are at the height of their moves for using not only land and sea but also cyber space as battlefield.
					
					 In case the cyber unit has its attacking capability, the SDF will completely turn into the force in attack formation.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that Japan is further accelerating its moves for reinvasion through the improvement of the SDF's attacking capability.
					
					 Then, the Japanese reactionaries' moves for reducing cyber space to a battlefield are bound to lead to reinvasion.
					
					 If they are engrossed in war hysteria for reinvasion while talking about the improvement of the so-called attacking capability, far from drawing a lesson from their crimes-woven past history, they will follow in the footsteps of their defeated predecessors.

articles.title: No-THAAD Struggle Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
No-THAAD Struggle Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Various organizations of south Korea reportedly held a rally in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province on August 16 in protest against the regime's THAAD deployment.
					 They included the Kimchon Citizens Measure Committee for Opposing THAAD Deployment and the Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism.
					
					 Speakers at the rally denounced the regime and the Ministry of Defense for unilaterally pushing ahead with the deployment, urging them to halt the project and operation of THAAD and retract the plan for the introduction of additional launchers.
					
					 They called on the public to pool efforts to carry on their struggle until THAAD is withdrawn.

articles.title: S. Koreans Urge Regime to Repatriate DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
S. Koreans Urge Regime to Repatriate DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Measure Council for Ensuring Human Rights of DPRK Women Employees, composed of various south Korean bodies including the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Human Rights Center of the Council of Christian Churches, released a statement on August 15 demanding the repatriation of the DPRK women citizens, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Deploring their plight of being forced to live under unstable armistice and lingering danger of war, the statement said:
					
					 The regime should make a decisive decision to open up a new era of national reconciliation, unity and reunification. To this end, it should thoroughly probe the truth behind the suspicious case of "defection from the north" masterminded by the Park Guen Hye-led forces meddling in the "state affairs" and the Intelligence Service, and repatriate the women citizens of the north, first of all.
					
					 The statement urged the regime to punish those responsible for the case and take a measure to prevent its reoccurrence.

articles.title: S. Koreans Snipe at Trump's War-inciting Remarks
articles.content:
S. Koreans Snipe at Trump's War-inciting Remarks
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Personages of various circles in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Aug. 17 at  which they criticized Trump's bellicose remarks adding fuel to the military tensions on the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean on-line newspaper Voice of People.
					 Speakers at the conference charged that Trump seeks to sell weapons after destabilizing the situation in Northeast Asia.
					
					 They urged the regime to face up to the present dangerous situation and stop the joint military drills with the U.S. 
					
					 Terming Trump's talk about "fire" engulfing the Korean peninsula a crime to not only kill human beings but also to vandalize the human civilization, they urged him to make an apology and stop making provocative remarks.

articles.title: S. Korea: Trade Unions Demand Basic Labor Rights
articles.content:
S. Korea: Trade Unions Demand Basic Labor Rights
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online paper Voice of People, the Government Employees' Union and the Teachers Union of south Korea held a joint press conference outside Chongwadae on Aug. 17, urging the authorities to ensure the basic labor rights and withdraw the notice on outlawing the teachers.
					 Speakers said that the present chief executive promised to ensure the basic labor rights during his "presidential" election but nothing has changed.
					
					 Such reality shows he only talks about cleaning up deep-rooted evils of the Park Geun Hye "government", they said, claiming that the unity of workers is the basic human right and the trade union should not allow anyone to interfere in it.
					
					 They stressed that the present "government" should immediately stop labeling the teachers' union as illegal.

articles.title: S. Korean Poet Slashes at Trump
articles.content:
S. Korean Poet Slashes at Trump
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A poem scathingly censuring Trump was posted on the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo on August 14, catching the eye of the public.
					 Poet Kwon Mal Son in her poem urged the U.S. to make an apology for having incited war and inflicted misfortune and pain upon the Korean nation.
					
					 Deploring that all south Koreans have lived in uneasiness and pain due to the U.S., the poem urged Trump to beg pardon on his knees before the souls trampled down by GIs' boots and withdraw the U.S. forces from south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo and the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association made public a joint statement on July 31 to hail the DPRK's successful second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 The statement said that the success is a great victory of the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and a great event as it laid a firm guarantee for reliably defending the peace and security on the Korean peninsula. It went on:
					
					 The arbitrary practice of the U.S. can never work on the DPRK which towered as a nuclear power in the East.
					
					 No force can check the victorious advance of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should refrain from making futile moves while vociferating about sanctions and pressure, recognize the strategic position of socialist Korea and make a switchover in its policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Together with the world progressives loving justice and aspiring after independence, we extend full support and firm solidarity to the self-defensive steps taken by the DPRK to resolutely smash all kinds of sanctions and pressure of the U.S. and its vassal forces and defend the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence as well as the regional peace and security.

articles.title: UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Rejected Abroad
articles.content:
UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Rejected Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Bodies of the Czech Republic and Russia issued statements denouncing the UNSC "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK between Aug. 7 and 11.
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said:
					
					 We flatly reject the "sanctions resolution" cooked up at the UN.
					
					 The adoption of the "resolution" once again proved that the UNSC has turned into a puppet of the U.S. imperialism, the most brutal aggressor and war provoker.
					
					 The "sanctions resolution" is the height of unreasonable discrimination, double standards and hypocrisy.
					
					 Some member states of the UNSC are possessed of ICBMs and nukes. They had better scrap their nukes and missiles before criticizing the DPRK.
					
					 The "sanctions resolution" was cooked for the imperialists and other reactionary forces seeking to topple the DPRK's socialist system, not for disarmament and peace.
					
					 We appeal to the world progressives to reject the "resolution" and intensify the activities for solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					 The Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea strongly urged the UNSC to repeal the "sanctions resolution" aimed at completely blocking the economic development and the improvement of the people's standard of living in the DPRK, saying that the DPRK's ICBM test-launch was part of the legitimate measures to defend itself from the imperialists' aggression.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Young Lenin Communist League of the Russian Federation bitterly denounced the imperialists for faulting the DPRK's independent policy of national defense.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Back DPRK Self-defensive Steps
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Back DPRK Self-defensive Steps
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Aug. 7 in support of the DPRK government statement.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. cooked up UNSC "sanctions resolution" 2371 over the ICBM test-launch by the DPRK.
					
					 The "resolution" is aimed to completely prevent the economic development and the improvement of the people's standard of living in the DPRK.
					
					 This is a hideous unethical crime invented by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The nuclear test and rocket test-launch by the DPRK are a very just action to defend the sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. will have to pay dearly by the DPRK's decisive counter-measures against the shameless aggressors.
					
					 We fully support all steps of the DPRK for self-defence.
					
					 The adoption of "sanctions resolution" 2371 is for mass slaughter.
					
					 Punish the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces!
					
					 Those countries, which got "thanks" from the U.S., should feel shame.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente de Sierra Leona
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente de Sierra Leona
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Republica de Sierra Leona, Ernest Bai Koroma, en relacion con que hubo muchas perdidas humanas y materiales en la capital de ese pais debido a las inundaciones y desplome de montana causados por las lluvias torrenciales.
					En la misiva, el remitente expreso profundo pesar y consuelo al gobierno, el pueblo y los habitantes de la region damnificada de Sierra Leona.
					
					Deseo que bajo la direccion del destinatario, el gobierno y el pueblo de Sierra Leona recuperen cuanto antes las perdidas y logren exitos en las tareas por la unidad nacional y el desarrollo socioeconomico.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju envia mensaje de condolencias a Mariano Rajoy Brey
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju envia mensaje de condolencias a Mariano Rajoy Brey
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- En relacion con que hubo muchas perdidas humanas por el ataque terrorista en Barcelona, Espana, el premier coreano Pak Pong Ju envio el dia 18 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo espanol Mariano Rajoy Brey.
					La misiva senala que el pueblo coreano comparte el dolor de perdidas con el espanol y que rechazar el terrorismo de todo tipo es la posicion invariable del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Desea que el gobierno y pueblo espanoles eliminen cuanto antes las consecuencias del atentado terrorista.
					
					Por otra parte, el canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho remitio el mismo dia el mensaje de consuelo al ministerio de Asuntos Exteriores y de Cooperacion de Espana.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX condena imposicion del vicepresidente estadounidense
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX condena imposicion del vicepresidente estadounidense
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada el dia 19 en relacion con que el vicepresidente norteamericano demando a varios paises latinoamericanos romper las relaciones diplomaticas con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio como sigue:
					 Durante su reciente visita a Chile, el vicepresidente estadounidense pidio a Brasil, Mexico, Chile y el Peru que rompan las relaciones diplomaticas con la RPDC.
					
					  No es la primera vez que EE.UU. obligara a los paises, que mantienen las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la RPDC, a romper los vinculos diplomaticos y economicos.
					
					  EE.UU. presiona a muchos paises de Asia, Africa, America Latina y Europa para que rompieran todas las relaciones con la RPDC.
					
					  Ese proceder despotico deja conocer el extremado egoismo y arrogancia de EE.UU. para sacar provechos propios sacrificando a todo el mundo y confirma que llega al climax su politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					  Esta condenada al repudio y rechazo tal imposicion de EE.UU. que constituye la intervencion flagrante en los asuntos internos de los independientes Estados soberanos y un desafio frontal a la ley y orden internacionales.
					
					  Si se tolera y se permite la gangsteril campana de sancion y presion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, se dara el resultado de que sean todos los paises las victimas de intervencion norteamericana en sus asuntos internos.
					
					  En el futuro tambien, nuestro pais fortalecera y desarrollara aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises del mundo bajo el ideal de independencia, paz y amistad.
					
					  Digan lo que digan otros, continuaran nuestros esfuerzos legitimos y responsables por defender la dignidad y la posicion estrategica del pais y establecer la verdadera justicia internacional frustrando la injusta e ilegal campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX critica disparates del secretario general de la ONU
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX critica disparates del secretario general de la ONU
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- En entrevista con la ACNC concedida hoy con motivo de que el secretario general de la ONU induce en error la opinion publica como si la causa de agravacion de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana estuviera en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio como sigue:
					 En la reciente entrevista de prensa sobre el problema de la Peninsula Coreana, el secretario general de la ONU dijo que la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana comenzo por el "desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles" de la RPDC.
					
					 Este disparate merece ser evaluado como expresion de la ignorancia sobre la esencia del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Claramente dicho, la causa de surgimiento del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y de proseguimiento del circulo vicioso de la agravacion de situacion reside en la politica hostil de EE.UU. y su amenaza nuclear contra la RPDC. 
					
					  Es absurdo que el secretario general de la ONU dijera asumir la posicion imparcial para la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana sin que reproche ni un apice a EE.UU. que lleva la situacion de esta zona a la fase de explosion.
					
					  Para relajar la situacion y prevenir el peligro de choque armado en la Peninsula Coreana y la region, EE.UU., que armo el lio introduciendo numerosos pertrechos estrategicos nucleares en los alrededores de nuestro pais, debe tomar primero la opcion correcta y mostrarla con accion.
					
					  Mientras no se eliminen radicalmente la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., no retrocederemos ni un paso de nuestro camino escogido de incrementar las fuerzas armadas nucleares.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX condena complicidad de Australia en la campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX condena complicidad de Australia en la campana anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC ofrecida este sabado en relacion con que el gobierno australiano se suma a las maniobras de EE.UU. que agravan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la siguiente respuesta:
					 En la entrevista con una radio local concedida el dia 11, el premier australiano enumero unos disparates tales como EE.UU. esta con Australia y otros paises aliados y en el tiempo de emergencia, Australia apoyara a EE.UU. en virtud del Tratado ANZUS que significa la ayuda mutua en el caso de que una parte fuera atacada.
					
					 Por otra parte, el ministro de Defensa Nacional y una figura militar del pais de Oceania publicaron oficialmente el envio de sus efectivos a los ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					  Desde que Trump expuso su fiebre belica pronunciando palabras como "llamas y furia", se produce ahora en el interior de EE.UU. la avalancha de criticas de muchos congresistas y otras figuras politicas y sociales mientras en la escena internacional, hasta los paises, que se creian aliados, se abstienen de incorporarse a las acciones agresivas de EE.UU.
					
					Al anunciar la incorporacion a las acciones agresivas de EE.UU. recordando hasta el nominal Tratado ANZUS y confirmar el envio de fuerzas armadas al entrenamiento de guerra nuclear de caracter agresivo de EE.UU., el premier y el circulo militar de Australia cometieron un acto suicida demostrando que no pueden percibir la gravedad de la situacion debido a su escasa vision politica.
					
					Lo ridiculo del caso es que el premier australiano, quien criticaba antes que las acciones de Trump en busca de enfrentamiento militar traeran el "resultado destructivo", cambio de repente su posicion ante la instruccion de EE.UU. sin tomar en consideracion los intereses nacionales.
					
					Lo que se ha ganado Australia por su participacion en las guerras coreana, vietnamita y "antiterrorista", patrocinadas por EE.UU., fue muchas bajas y enormes perdidas.
					
					Al gobierno australiano le convendria esforzarse por preservar a su pais en paz, en lugar de adherirse a la campana de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. olvidandose de la leccion de la historia.
					
					Los paises como Australia, que se suman a la aventura militar contra la RPDC obedeciendo a ciegas a EE.UU., no podran evitar nuestras justas contramedidas.
